     I'm just about tired of you people calling each other's typographical errors. Shroomy, usually when you want to correct people, you should use correct grammar yourself.
  1. "It's" not "Its" (short for "it is")
  2. "one" not "on"
  3. "remain up." (preposition at the end of a sentence)
  4. "Because," (comma used when not needed)
  5. "Something most of you neglect to do!" (fragment, not a sentence)

     Next time you want to call someone on their grammar/errors think twice, I'm watching.
